tool_description: Locate articles on Elon Musk from news sources and blogs across the web with our JSON API
name: Elon Musk News
title: Elon Musk News

api_list.name: Get all news source
api_list.description: The endpoint will return all news sources from where the articles are fetched.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://elon-musk-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/websites"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "elon-musk-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Elon Musk News based on news source
api_list.description: The endpoint will return all articles based on news source

import requests

url = "https://elon-musk-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Elon Musk News
api_list.description: The endpoint will return all news articles related to Elon Musk from select publications
